Posted By: Ferlord (5/5/2012 5:35:06 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Probably one of the best-flavored +X/-X card i've seen.  
Regrettably not all that useful though.  
I know it's supposed to be a somewhat dynamic card, but in comparison to other cards it just does not quite seem to achieve either thing.  
  
Now if the fire would grow (so the creature would get +1/-1 each turn by using counters - either directly on the creature or special ones on the aura), this would be a whole lot more interesting.  
This would also flavorwise make sense, since as it is, a  [Scathe Zombie](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Scathe Zombie) actually *won't* die by this Guise of Fire eventually.  
Would probably have been too elaborate for a Common slot then though.  
(But it would make an interesting red version of [Unstable Mutation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unstable Mutation)...)
posts.html:
Probably one of the best-flavored +X/-X card i've seen.
Regrettably not all that useful though.
I know it's supposed to be a somewhat dynamic card, but in comparison to other cards it just does not quite seem to achieve either thing.

Now if the fire would grow (so the creature would get +1/-1 each turn by using counters - either directly on the creature or special ones on the aura), this would be a whole lot more interesting.
This would also flavorwise make sense, since as it is, a Scathe Zombie actually won't die by this Guise of Fire eventually.
Would probably have been too elaborate for a Common slot then though.
(But it would make an interesting red version of Unstable Mutation...)
